description:
using havana master.  

when running with the VMwareVCDriver along with the nova vlanmanager, the port-group vlans that are created are created per-host, rather than having a single distributed port-group that applies across the whole cluster.  

While this behavior is unexpected in terms of what the administrator expects to see, I believe it is still functionally correct, so this is just a wishlist issue.
title: vsphere + vlanmanager still creates per-host port groups, not distributed port groups
